_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: vps
author: dxomg129@protonmail.com

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
cd /mnt/server

rm * -rf # Remove all inside container

rm .installed -rf # Remove .installed

apt update
apt install -y curl

url="https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dxomg/vpsfreepterovm/main/PteroVM.sh"
max_retries=10
timeout=5
retry_interval=1

for ((i=1; i<=$max_retries; i++)); do
    curl -m $timeout -O $url && break || (
        echo "Retry in $retry_interval seconds..."
        sleep $retry_interval
    )
done
